tool_description: The YouTube Video Download API provides a convenient way to extract video data from YouTube URLs and retrieve downloadable video links. By integrating with this API, developers can programmatically fetch video information, including metadata like video quality, format, and download links. This API supports filtering based on specific video attributes, such as itag, allowing users to target desired video qualities.
